entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for `dotnet store --package <packageName>.nupkg` #42808
  • Implement DevDeviceId generation and transmission #42804
    9.0.1xx
  • Maui Blazor Hybrid web app space in name error #42799
  • .NET SDK installer UI always displayed in wrong launguage #42780
  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils' #42779

Closed

  • Double writes when performing a PublishAOT publish #30093
    9.0.1xx
  • NuGet package documentation files are not published with project #2393
    Discussion
  • Modification of project file properties / items in targets #2340
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update stage 0 to fix cppcli tests #42806
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • model info, version, and other structures more how S.CL wants them to be modeled #42801
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Backport of auditSources fix #42800
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create Pipe Server per Test Application in dotnet test #42785
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Enable 9.0.1xx branch for SDKDiffTests and LicenseScanTest #42784
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42777
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Implicit version update to the live version for RC1 #42745
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42798
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enabled codeflow through 9.0.1xx #42766
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #42701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting proposal #42437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support launchSettings.json workingDirectory with dotnet run #42534
    untriaged, Area-CLI
